title: T206 Broadleaf 350 PSA 1 MK For Trade
author: soxinseven

posts.post_title: T206 Broadleaf 350 PSA 1 MK For Trade
posts.post_content:
Hello I have a PSA 1 MK Broadleaf of Arellanes that I would like to trade. The front has issues but the back is very presentable. In trade I would be looking for scarcer backed T206s or E94s. I will consider offers but would like to try and trade it first.
                                        Thanks,
                                         Steve

i need an affordable broadleaf for my back run. this one fits perfectly into my collection.

i know you are not keen on selling but that is all i really have to offer.

what is the purchase price?

kevin
